Html:
Is there a way to echo a star value to a form field. I have your rateit script working perfectly. Nice easy script to use except can't figure out how to save the result

Visitor picks 4 stars

If you are using example 2b, the value should be in your backingfield (in 2b, the right value is selected in the select box).
